inclusion.criterion: acute appendicitis uncomplicated by computed tomography
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: CT scan showed evidence of acute perforated appendicitis with free fluid in the pelvis

inclusion.criterion: computed tomography with injection of contrast product
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: arguments for a complicated appendicitis: fever> 38.5 ° C, hyperleucytosis> 15,000,
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: The patient is febrile with tenderness, rebound tenderness and guarding on palpation

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: Diagnostic laparoscopy revealed phlegmon with no other abdominal abnormalities

exclusion.criterion: a fluid effusion of medium or great abundance
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: CT scan showed evidence of acute perforated appendicitis with free fluid in the pelvis

exclusion.criterion: History of abdominal surgery by laparotomy
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: rapid sequence induction with the use of ketamine
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a candidate for emergent laparoscopic appendectomy under general anesthesia.
